name: Bee Game (jshier)
description:
Play as a worker bee in a hive, go through each stage of its life and see just how busy the life of a bee really is.

Links:

http://www.helpsavebees.co.uk/

http://www.buzzaboutbees.net/save-the-bees.html

http://sos-bees.org/

https://savebees.org/

Made by Team 85/100

Luke Tanner, Joshua Shier, Armin Anderson, Simon Benichou
